scenario_text.value: What a nasty attack that was.

Anywhere else, my beloved children would have
dried up and died by now.

Still, I can set up any traps I please in
these waterways I know so well.

Surely it’s about time to harvest them?
If we have this many human children...

Hold on. Best not to make light of those
allied with the humans.

Don’t you see? That’s why I’m attacking their
spirits like this.

Too bad we didn’t have any quality minions to
throw at them. Worthless, really...

But as a result, I managed to spot an
interesting child.

You’ll know soon enough...
Ho ho ho...
